name: ackee
tagline: A privacy-focused web analytics platform without cookies or user tracking
description: Ackee is an open-source, self-hosted web analytics tool built with Node.js and MongoDB, designed for privacy-conscious users. Unlike many mainstream analytics platforms, it does not rely on tracking cookies or unique user identifiers and puts your data firmly in your own control. It provides a clean, minimal dashboard interface to monitor key metrics (like page views, referrers, session durations) and supports a fully documented GraphQL API for custom integrations.

features.title: Privacy-Friendly Analytics
features.description: Collects website usage data without tracking individual users

features.title: Event-Based Tracking
features.description: Measures page views and custom events defined by the site owner

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Runs entirely on infrastructure controlled by the operator

features.title: Anonymized Data Storage
features.description: Stores analytics data without personal identifiers

features.title: Minimal Dashboard
features.description: Displays traffic statistics in a simple web interface
